pr_title: Store href as part of a Job's configured project data

timeline.message: Feat(BlackDuck): Store href and project owner email in blackduck_job_projects and migrate from old versions
Feat(BlackDuck): Update job java models to include href and project owner email
Chore: Add FIXME comments for changes required to fully support href and project owner email
Feat(Liquibase): Use BlackDuck project href in primary key rather than project name
Feat(Job): Add list of projects as top-level field on JobFieldModel
Feat(Job UI): Begin tracking configuredProviderProjects in UI state
Feat(UI): Begin implementing table select value basic object support
Feat(BlackDuck): Prepare DB API layer for storing more project fields
Fixing header, fixing object copy, fixing data selection
Merge branch 'master' into gk_migrate_href and resolve conflicts
Merge branch 'master' into gk_migrate_href and resolve conflicts/compile errors
Fix(Job): Set missing timestamp fields where appropriate
Feat(Job): Update JobConfigActions to properly persist projects from JobFieldModel
Fix(UI): Set initial values for edit/copy in jobs to be JSON when appropriate

timeline.bodyText: Required as long as we are dynamically generating the Job modal.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: As an AlertSerializableModel the .toString() method will be in JSON format.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Should be lower case P, projectFiltersToSave
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.message: Fix(UI): Make provider project rows deselectable
